entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:14 p.m. EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. A few showers beginning after midnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 mm. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few showers. Temperature steady near 9.
